headline: 1,900% Stock Gains and Hate Mail: Welcome to Quantum Investing
summary: The rally has placed them among the best performers in the stock market, dwarfing the returns of popular artificial intelligence plays like Palantir Technologies Inc. With market capitalizations that exceed $10 billion, the companies are more valuable than soup maker Campbell’s Co., even though they have less than 1% of the revenue.  Welcome to the world of quantum computing investing, which inhabits one of the most speculative and fiercely debated corners of the stock market.  “If it works, it’s going to be huge and explosive,” said Troy Jensen, an analyst at Cantor Fitzgerald, who covers a handful of quantum computing stocks, including Rigetti and D-Wave.
